name: LovelyPlants
0:
”Alexa, open Lovely Plants.”
”Tell me a cool fact.”
”Recommend me a plant.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lovely plants
des:
We want Lovely Plants helps you learn a little more about plants and their benefits. Perhaps we already know or just realize that they do so much for us and perhaps it is time to give back a little of our interest and time to take care of them.

Lovely Plants can help you select plants according to that garden idea you are looking for, just ask Alexa: Recommend me a Plant
If you have the concern to know some descriptive data of a plant that you have heard, just ask Alexa for it: What is a Rose? or any other plant.
Or maybe you like to hear some interesting fact about plants, just ask Alexa: Tell me a cool fact.
Like many of us, you may ask yourself questions about plants such as why are they green? Are they living beings? How do plants help us? Where do they come from?

As will find out, plants are not only for ornament and get good sight of gardens but can be life companions that help us to keep a working mind and body.

We all hope you can enjoy this skill as much as us in making it possible.

Note: The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
